page.title: 05LAW AND ORDER PART TWO
page.content: Because he is part of our{community he knows his beat,he is aware of change.A typical day includes visiting a school to give a talk on cycling proficiency,inquiring about a crime,checking a house when an elderly lady has not been seen for several days,talking to the parents of a child who seemed to be at risk and making inquiries to other{police forces outside the county of Essex. Mr.Humphries feels that being a NBO enables him not only to{investigate crime,but to{prevent crime}and to care for the community as a whole.
